text: @JoeBiden Nancy Pelosi introduced her coronavirus bill Monday, including "Obamaphone" program, require same-day voter registration, pay off $10,000 in student debt per person, reduce airline carbon emissions 50 % by 2050. What dies this have to do with the Coronavirus?
